page.title: 07FOOD
page.content: Food is a topic close to all our hearts, and I am going to describe to you the sorts of food I eat at this moment in time in 1985. Most meals include real meat, whether it be beef, or chicken, or sausages or bacon. Even eggs make an appearance, boiled, fried or poached. Breakfast consists of cereal (Corn Flakes), with tea to drink and toast to follow. Sometimes bacon and eggs also appear on the menu. Dinnertime is not a snack but a main meal, with anything from fishcakes to sphagetti, but with by-far the most popular ingredient being CHIPS - and LOTS of them! Tea is usually combined with supper to form a high-tea, and some may say I'm greedy, but it is yet another cooked meal. Sometimes I vary it with salad.
